name: Bonampak Ruins
description:
Introduction

Archeological site with the best Mayan mural paintings in the world. The site is very small and only a handfull of buildings have been excavated, but the main reason to travel so far is the building of the paintings, 3 rooms full of murals in very decent state (after so many centuries is amazing they are still visible).

Descent
